specials.name: Ranged
specials.description: spectral anvil +12 (magical, range increment 80 feet), Damage 5d6+6 lawful plus anvil mark

specials.name: Strike the Anvil
specials.description: The sentinel conjures an ethereal hammer to strike a creature that has an anvil mark. The target takes 3d8 lawful damage and loses the mark.

specials.name: Construct Armor
specials.description: Like normal objects, a sentinel has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once a sentinel statue is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks and its Armor Class is reduced to 22.
